description.plain:
Milky Chance is a German folk duo with reggae and electronic music influences made up of Clemens Rehbein, Philipp Dausch, and Antonio Greger, with Clemens as lead vocalist/guitarist, Dausch as the audio mixer and Antonio plays to the harmonica.

In 2013. they released the album Sadnecessary, which was a great success all over the world. Their sophomore album Blossom was released in 2017.

body.plain:
Milky Chance is a German folk duo with reggae and electronic music influences made up of Clemens Rehbein, Philipp Dausch, and Antonio Greger, with Clemens as lead vocalist/guitarist, Dausch as the audio mixer and Antonio plays to the harmonica.

In 2013. they released the album Sadnecessary, which was a great success all over the world. Their sophomore album Blossom was released in 2017.

songs.title: Stolen Dance

description.plain:
The first single released from their debut album Sadnecessary, the song was originally released to little worldwide fanfare on April 5th 2013 and became number one in Austria, France, Belgium, Switzerland, Poland, Czech Republic and Hungary.

Gaining popularity across Europe the song continued to be released in many different countries, eventually being released in Australia and the USA, also charting in the UK despite not yet being released.

  


In an interview they said it’s about missing a person:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwOYKDkERKQ

And another one:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hCNWzRBKRB8

songs.embed_content: Read “Stolen Dance” by Milky Chance on Genius

songs.title: Cocoon

description.plain:
“Cocoon” is  Milky Chance’s first song since their 2013 debut album, Sadnecessary. Guitarist Antonio Greger joined the group last year, as well.

According to a press release, the title “Cocoon” is intended to let fans know the duo— lead vocalist and guitarist Clemens Rehbein and DJ and producer Philipp Dausch—have used the last three years off from music to return to a “place of serenity” for their next album.

In a recent interview, Milky Chance member Clemens Rehbein states that “Cocoon” describes:

trying to find a place where you can be yourself and not be distracted; to slow down and reflect on yourself

songs.embed_content: Read “Cocoon” by Milky Chance on Genius

In a recent interview, Milky Chance member Clemens Rehbein states that “Cocoon” describes:

songs.full_title: Down by the River by Milky Chance
songs.title: Down by the River

description.plain:
‘Down By The River’ was re-released as a single in March 2014, five months after their debut album ‘Sadnecessary’ was released in October 2013.

Written by vocalist and guitarist Clemens Rehbein of ‘Milky Chance’.

body.plain:
‘Down By The River’ was re-released as a single in March 2014, five months after their debut album ‘Sadnecessary’ was released in October 2013.

Written by vocalist and guitarist Clemens Rehbein of ‘Milky Chance’.

songs.lyrics:
26 ContributorsDown by the River Lyrics[Intro]
Down by the river, I was drawn by your grace
Into tempest of oblivion and to the lovers' place
I was stucked in a puddle full of tears and unwise dark doings
Now I know that we've paid unlike
Honey, I know, hey, when we walked arm in arm
I felt like we can throw away the falseness of our past
And I know too, it's been the hardest days for you
Let's throw them out the window that's what those lovers do
